mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_thread_stream (user_id, thread_id, comment, to_stream_id, create_time, update_time, likes, dislikes) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{threadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toStreamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dislikes,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update bu.wq_thread_stream set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thread_id = #{threadId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_stream_id = #{toStreamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, likes = #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dislikes = #{dislikes,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, thread_id, comment, to_stream_id, create_time, update_time, likes, dislikes from bu.wq_thread_stream where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, thread_id, comment, to_stream_id, create_time, update_time, likes, dislikes from bu.wq_thread_stream
